definition: Qing or Ch'ing dynasty of imperial China (1644-1911)/surname Qing
clear/distinct/quiet/just and honest/pure/to settle or clear up/to clean up or purge

the five Liang of the Sixteen Kingdoms, namely: Former Liang 前涼|前凉 (314-376), Later Liang 後涼|后凉 (386-403), Northern Liang 北涼|北凉 (398-439), Southern Liang 南涼|南凉 (397-414), Western Liang 西涼|西凉 (400-421)

sentences.english: A cool spring above the timberline.
What's not to like about a refreshing beer on a hot summer afternoon?
sentences.chinese: 炎热的夏日午后来杯清凉的啤酒怎么样？

sentences.english: All around, there is a cool and welome feeling.
sentences.chinese: 四周是一片清凉宜人的感觉。

sentences.english: Your criticism had a sobering effect on me.
sentences.chinese: 你的批评对我是一服很好的清凉剂。

sentences.english: am delighted to have cool waters of a brook rush through my open fingers.
sentences.chinese: 我非常高兴让清凉的溪水流过我的张开的手指。

sentences.english: Therefore, the diet chooses also suitably selects cool moistens gentle.
sentences.chinese: 所以，饮食选择上也宜选用清凉滋润平和之品。

sentences.english: Relieve heat, coolness, act as painkiller, relieve itchiness and release tension.
sentences.chinese: 散风热，清凉，镇痛，止痒，减轻不适。

sentences.english: If you like, can also add a little mint, more cool and delicious.
sentences.chinese: 要是愿意的话，也可以再加一点薄荷，更加清凉可口。
内政部防汗带提供清凉舒适。

sentences.english: The cold water makes me feel like in the heaven!
sentences.chinese: 清凉的水让我感觉像在天堂一样。

sentences.english: The temperature falls down below 30 degrees Celsius. It's so cool.
sentences.chinese: 温度也爽快地降到了三十度以下，好不清凉。

sentences.english: Later that day, I took the captain a cool drink.
sentences.chinese: 那天晚些时候，我送了一杯清凉饮料到老船长屋里去。

sentences.english: Cool energy drink spotted in the nether - regions of Bratislava.
sentences.chinese: 清凉饮料发现了虚空，布拉迪斯拉发地区。
